Image to show cat button in the category

Celebrating 11 years of dedicated service in the veterinary industry, our clinic takes pride in a rich history marked by unwavering commitment and expertise in animal care. Over the years, we have steadfastly served as a trustworthy ally in fostering the health and happiness of countless beloved pets. Experience our enduring dedication as we continue to provide top-notch medical care and genuine compassion for your cherished animal companions. Feel free to reach out to us for more information

Committed to the well-being and satisfaction of your furry companions, our adept team of veterinary experts ensures exceptional patient encounters, reflecting our unwavering dedication to excellence in care. Contact us to learn more about how we prioritize the health and happiness of your beloved pets. Your furry babies deserve the best, and were here to provide it.

Step into a world where your pets joy and well-being take center stage. Our dedicated team of veterinary doctors and compassionate staff are committed to providing top-notch care, ensuring your furry friends live their happiest and healthiest lives. With a blend of expertise, cutting-edge technology, and genuine love for animals, we create an environment where your pets feel cherished and nurtured. Join us in this journey of exceptional pet care, where your trust meets our passion for creating lasting moments of joy for your beloved companions.

Thanks to our devoted clients, our veterinary clinic has remained open, dedicated to providing unparalleled care for your fur babies. We are immensely grateful for the ongoing support that allows us to extend our services and continue nurturing the well-being of your beloved pets. Your trust fuels our commitment to excellence, and we look forward to many more years of delivering compassionate care to your furry family members.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐(5/5)\n\nWe strongly believe that an ounce of prevention is worth of a pound of cure especially with pets that age much faster than humans. As such, you will find our veterinarians focusing on preventive care options. Every patient is evaluated and an individual treatment plan is discussed.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐(5/5)\n\nBy enrolling in our Pet Wellness Program, you are making a proactive commitment to your pet\'s health and happiness. With comprehensive preventive care, personalized attention, and a dedicated team of professionals, we aim to enhance and extend the lives of your beloved pets.

⭐⭐⭐⭐(4/5)\n\nWhen your pet requires surgical intervention, our skilled team is here to provide compassionate and professional care. Whether it\'s a routine spay/neuter procedure or a complex orthopedic surgery, we prioritize your pet\'s safety and comfort throughout the entire process.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐(5/5)\n\nTo aid in accurate diagnoses, our clinic offers a range of laboratory services. From blood work and urinalysis to diagnostic imaging, we utilize advanced technology and techniques to assess your pet\'s health and provide timely results.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐(5/5)\n\nMaintaining good oral health is crucial for your pet\'s overall well being. Our dental care services include professional cleanings, tooth extractions when necessary, and advice on home dental care techniques to keep their teeth and gums healthy.

⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐(5/5)\n\nWe understand the importance of maintaining your pet\'s hygiene and appearance. Our grooming services include bathing, brushing, haircuts, and nail trimming, ensuring your pet looks and feels their best.

TERMS AND CONDITION

Last Updated: March 4, 2024

Thank you for choosing Pet Allies (referred to as the "Service" or "Application"). We take the terms and conditions very seriously. These terms and conditions govern the use of the App information. We kindly ask you to thoroughly review these terms.

These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") shall represent the legal agreement between you ("User") and Pet Allies Animal Clinic ("we", "us", or "our"). By downloading or using the App, you agree to be bound by these Terms:

1. Use of the App

1.1. The App is intended for use by individuals seeking information about veterinary services provided by Pet Allies Animal Clinic.

1.2. You agree not to use the App for any illegal or unauthorized purpose, or in any manner that violates these Terms.

2. Intellectual Property

2.1. All content included in the App, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, button icons, images, audio clips, digital downloads, data compilations, and software, is the property of Pet Allies Animal Clinic or its content suppliers and is protected by Philippine and international copyright laws.

2.2. You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, transmit, display, perform, or create derivative works of any content from the App without our prior written consent.

3. Disclaimer of Warranties

3.1. The App is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis, without any warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not warrant that the App will be uninterrupted or error-free, that defects will be corrected, or that the App is free of viruses or other harmful components.

4. Changes to Terms

4.1. We reserve the right to modify or revise these Terms at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting the revised Terms in the App. Your continued use of the App following the posting of changes constitutes your acceptance of such changes.

5. Contact Us

5.1. If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at pet_alliesanimalclinic@yahoo.com.
